stories.text:
To help with my mental health, I am rebooting my life. I now will work for myself, be myself, grow myself utilizing my passions in life.

I am going to spend 3 months in a remote cabin (with an ice-cold stream for ice baths) working on my passion.

I am fluent in Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Cantonese and I also enjoy coding in c++.

What are some ideas for programming projects utilizing my knowledge of these languages?
stories.title: Ask HN: Help me utilize my passion
Denmark Will Hold June Referendum on Joining EU’s Defense Pact
Ryven – Flow-based visual scripting for Python
Ask HN: Is Russia the Next North Korea?
Future of software. Why UX designers should care about type theory (2013)
Students launch site to connect Ukrainian refugees with potential hosts abroad
Russia is allegedly preparing to disconnect from the Internet
Windows Defender is enough, if you harden it
Resiliens – Python decorators that make your code more resilient

stories.text: For long-term entrepreneurs that are burned out, but do not want to exit yet, what do you do?
stories.title: Ask HN: How do entrepreneurs manage burnout?
